spells.name: Dragonic Blast
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
As an additional cost to play this card, Exhaust any number of Dragon Units you control. Deal X000 to up to two target Units (X is the number of Dragons you Exhausted).

spells.name: Imbued by Fire
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Target Fire Unit gets +2000 this turn.

spells.name: Mechdragon's Flame
spells.effect: Expel target Unit if its power is less than the highest power of a Dragon Unit you control.

spells.name: Cryptic Deflection
spells.effect:
Instacast
If your Champion is "Jemial, Cryptic Caster", you can remove four counters from that card instead of paying this card's cost. Target Unit cannot be targeted by Spells or Abilities this turn.

spells.name: Force Blast
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card anytime you have priority.)
Return target Unit with cost 2 or less to its owner's hand.

spells.name: Phantasmal Guards
spells.effect: Put two Illusion Unit Tokens into play with Guardian (Unit * Illusion/Water/500). These Tokens cannot attack.

spells.name: Shards of Winter
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card anytime you have priority.)
Exhaust all Units your opponent controls.

spells.name: Hurricane Shot
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
As an additional cost to play this card, return an Air Unit from your field to its owner's hand. Destroy target Unit with cost 4 or less.

spells.name: Royal Reflection
spells.effect:
Instacastv(You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Change the target of a Spell or Ability to another legal target.

spells.name: Tornado Shot
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Play only if an Air Unit returned to your hand from the field this turn.
Deal 2000 to target Unit.

spells.name: Holy Slash
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Destroy targe attacking Unit.

spells.name: Dusk Strike
spells.effect:
Instacast
You can play this card only if you control a Dark unit.
Target unit gets -2500 this turn.

spells.name: Strike of the Golems
spells.effect: Put into play up to two target Golem Units from your discard zone with combined cost of 5 or less.

spells.name: Uncertain Experiment
spells.effect: Look at the top four cards of your deck. You can reveal one Golem Unit among them and add it to your hand. Place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

spells.name: Voidfire Desolation
spells.effect:
Destroy up to one of each.
* Target unit.
* Target augment.
* Target shard.
* Target tower.

spells.name: Return to Slumber
spells.effect:
Instacast
Return up to X+1 target units to the top of their owner's deck in any order. (X equals the number of destroyed Water towers.)

spells.name: Melody of Ages
spells.effect: Target unit or augment loses all abilities. Then, if there is a destroyed Air tower, destroy that card.

spells.name: The Greatest Heist
spells.effect:
Arrive - Expel up to X+1 target cards from your opponent's discard zone. (X equals the number of destroyed Dark towers.)
While this card is on the field, you may play cards expelled by this effect as if they were in your hand.

spells.name: Ready for War
spells.effect:
Instacast
Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put into play as many revealed Fire units as possible with cost (3) or less. Send the rest to the discard zone.

spells.name: Ariana's Resolve
spells.effect:
Choose one. If your champion has "Ariana" in its name, you may choose both.
* Search your deck for an "Ariana" or "AIRA" unit and add it to your hand.
* Put target "Kala" unit and/or "Ariana's Amulet" from your discard zone into play.

spells.name: Tempest Punch
spells.effect:
Instacast
Target attacking unit you control gets +2000, and return it to its owner's hand at the end of the turn. If your champion has "Ariana" in its name, that unit also cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells or abilities this turn.

spells.name: Dance of Blades
spells.effect: Instacast Deal 500 to target unit. If this destroys the unit, put a Knight token (Unit * Knight/Light/1500) into play.

spells.name: Ancient Serpent's Breath
spells.effect:
Instacast
As an additional cost to play this card, you may Shard Drain 1. If you do, return target Unit to the top of its owner's deck.
Return target Unit with cost 2 or less to its owner's hand, then its owner draws one card.

spells.name: Astonishing Betrayal
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Destroy target Unit that dealt damage this turn.

spells.name: Blood Sacrifice
spells.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card, sacrifice a Dark Unit.
Discard one random card from your opponent's hand.

spells.name: Brain Wipe Beam
spells.effect:
Target a Unit. If its power is 2000 or less,
Exhaust it and take control of it. If its power is more than 2000, give it -2000 this turn.

spells.name: Brilliant Barrier
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target Unit this turn.

spells.name: Celestial Magic: Chronostasis
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Place all Units on the field on the bottom of their owner's decks, in any order you choose.

spells.name: Corum Reinforcements
spells.effect: Put two Knight Unit Tokens into play (Unit * Knight/Light/1000).

spells.name: Cruel Accord
spells.effect: Discard one card from your hand, then your opponent discards two cards from their hand.

spells.name: Cry of Madness
spells.effect: Discard two random cards from your opponent's hand.

spells.name: Cryptic Secret
spells.effect:
Play only if there is a destroyed Light or Water Tower.
Shuffle target Unit back into its owner's deck.

spells.name: Debilitating Miasma
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Up to two target Units get -2000 this turn.

spells.name: Disintegration Shot
spells.effect:
Choose one.
* Destroy target Augment.
* Destroy target Unit with cost 1 or less.

spells.name: Enraged Attack
spells.effect: Put into play one Unit with cost 3 or less from your hand, and, if you do, deal 1000 to target Unit.

spells.name: Enveloped in Darkness
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Target attacking Unit gets -1000 this turn.

spells.name: Finishing Ray
spells.effect: Destroy all Units.

spells.name: Gathering Shardlight
spells.effect:
Instacast (Play this card any time you have priority.)
Draw two cards, then discard one card.

spells.name: Knowledge Unbound
spells.effect: Draw three cards.

spells.name: Lightning Shot
spells.effect: Deal 3000 to target Unit and 1000 to another target Unit.

spells.name: Molten Explosion
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Destroy target Unit with 2000 power or less.

spells.name: Omega Magic: Hikari
spells.effect:
Instacast
Put into play one Knight unit token with Guardian (Unit * Knight/Light/1000). If you have two or less towers remaining, put into play two tokens instead.

spells.name: Omega Magic: Kasai
spells.effect:
Instacast
Deal 1500 to target attacking or blocking unit.
Then, if you have two or less towers remaining, deal 2000 to target unit.

spells.name: Omega Magic: Kaze
spells.effect:
Instacast
If you have two or less towers remaining, this card costs (0) to play.
Target unit cannot deal damage or attack this turn. Draw one card.

spells.name: Omega Magic: Mizu
spells.effect:
Instacast
Choose one OR if you have two or less towers remaining, choose two.
* Draw one card.
* Exhaust target unit.
* Return target unit to its owner's hand if it is exhausted.

spells.name: Omega Magic: Yami
spells.effect:
Instacast
Choose one OR if you have two or less towers remaining you can choose both.
* Target unit gets -1000 this turn.
* Return target unit with cost (3) or less from your discard zone to the field.

spells.name: Phoenix Flame Strike
spells.effect: If you control a "Raoyenna" Unit, this card costs 1 less to play. Deal 1000 to all Units your opponent controls.

spells.name: Poisonous Strike
spells.effect:
Instacast
Target attacking or blocking Unit gets -2000 this turn, then your opponent discards one card from their hand.

spells.name: Rao Fire Bomb
spells.effect: Deal 1500 to target Unit and 1000 to each Unit adjacent to it.

spells.name: Reactive Runes
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Return target Unit that came into play this turn to the top of its owner's deck.

spells.name: Returning Shadows
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Add target Unit from your discard zone to your hand.

spells.name: Royal Command
spells.effect: Switch all Air Units you control to Active. Air Units get +1000 this turn.

spells.name: Shardsword Nova
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
As an additional cost to play this card, discard one Gear or sacrifice one Gear you control.
Destroy target Unit with cost 3 or less.

spells.name: Soul Transfer
spells.effect: Destroy target Unit, and, if you do, you can put into play a Unit from your discard zone whose cost is lower than the destroyed Unit.

spells.name: Supply Deal
spells.effect: Discard one Gear from your hand, then draw two cards.

spells.name: Tidal Rush
spells.effect:
Instacast
As an additional cost to play this card, you may Shard Drain 1. If you do, return target unit to its owner's hand.
Return target unit to its owner's hand, then draw one card.

spells.name: Vi's Blessing
spells.effect:
Choose one.
* Add up to two target Gears from your discard zone to your hand.
* Equip target Gear from your discard zone to target Unit you control.

spells.name: Winds of the Cloudsea
spells.effect:
Instacast (You can play this card any time you have priority.)
Return X target Units you control to their owners' hands, then put into play one Unit from your hand with cost X or less.

spells.name: Blazestriker Dive
spells.effect: Put into play one Blazewalker unit you own from your hand or that is expelled with cost X, and if you do, deal damage equal to its power to any unit in a zone in front of it.

spells.name: Dragon God's Scale
spells.effect:
Instacast
Target Dragon unit you control cannot be targeted by spells this turn.

spells.name: Entreat the Blazewalkers

spells.name: Ghostly Demise
spells.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card, Offering X (Expel any number of units from your discard zone).
Destroy all units with cost X. (X equals the number of units expelled for Offering.)

spells.name: Glorious Quake
spells.effect:
Instacast
Deal X000 to target unit, and if you do, exhaust each unit adjacent to it. (X equals the highest cost of a Unit you control.)

Instacast
Return target unit you control to its owner's hand, and if you do draw one card.

spells.name: March of the Corum Brigade

spells.name: Neutral Evil

spells.name: Order of the Rose
spells.effect: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. You may add one revealed "Rose Knight" unit from them to your hand. If you do, you may also add a revealed Gear to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

spells.name: Phantasmal Army
spells.effect:
Put into play Illusion unit tokens (Unit * Illusion/Water/1000) equal to the number of units your opponent controls.
Shard Drain 1, expel this card from your discard zone: Search your deck for a "Phantasmal Army" and add it to your hand.

spells.name: Phantasmal Bolt
spells.effect:
Deal 1000 to target unit your opponent controls, and if this destroys it, you may add a Witch unit from your discard zone to your hand.
Shard Drain 1, expel this card from your discard zone: Search your deck for a "Phantasmal Bolt" and add it to your hand.

spells.name: Phantasmal Storm
spells.effect:
Instacast
Deal 2000 to target unit.
Shard Drain 1, expel this card from your discard zone: Search your deck for a "Phantasmal Storm" and add it to your hand.

spells.name: Quicksand Trap

spells.name: Secrets Reveled
spells.effect: Look at the top three cards of either player's deck and put them back in any order.

spells.name: Song of the Sky
spells.effect:
Play this card only if two or more units returned from the field to your hand this turn.
The next card you play this turn costs (2) less to play.

spells.name: Treat!
spells.effect:
Instacast
As an additional cost to play this card, sacrifice a unit.
Search your deck for a number of cards equal to the sacrificed unit's cost, and send them to the discard zone.

spells.name: Trick!
spells.effect:
Instacast
Target unit loses all abilities this turn.

spells.name: Vabriel's Final Gift
spells.effect: Search your deck for any card and add it to your hand.

spells.name: Whelp Spark
spells.effect: Deal 500 to target unit.

spells.name: Assault from the Deep
spells.effect: Put into play a Water unit from your hand with cost (X) or less. Then if you have four or more face-up towers, you may return a unit to its owner's hand with cost (X) or less. (X equals the number of your face-up towers.)

spells.name: Assault of Ashes
spells.effect:
Instacast
Choose one. If you control three or more Fire units you may choose both.
* Deal 500 to target unit.
* Destroy target damaged unit.

spells.name: Bagoom’s Roar
spells.effect:
Instacast
Exhaust target unit. If you control "The Great Magimaze" Exhaust up to two instead.

spells.name: Celestial Team-up!
spells.effect: Draw two cards. Then, if you control both an Air and Water unit, you may put a unit from your hand into play with cost (X) or less. (X equals the number of cards in your hand.)

spells.name: Cloudsea Offensive Formation
spells.effect:
Instacast
Play only while you control an Airship unit.
Destroy target unit or augment.

spells.name: Cloudsea Preparation
spells.effect: Add target Skyraider and target Airship unit from your discard zone to your hand. If you've played two or more other cards this turn, you may put them into play instead.

spells.name: Cosmic Air Magic
spells.effect:
Instacast
This card costs (1) less to play for each face-up Air tower.
The next Arrive - ability does not trigger this turn.

spells.name: Cosmic Dark Magic
spells.effect:
This card costs (1) less to play for each face-up Dark tower.
Look at the top three cards of your deck. You may add a Dark unit among them to your hand. Send the rest to the discard zone.

spells.name: Cosmic Fire Magic
spells.effect:
Instacast
This card costs (1) less to play for each face-up Fire tower.
This turn Ruined - abilities of units do not trigger.

spells.name: Cosmic Light Magic
spells.effect:
This card costs (1) less to play for each face-up Light tower.
Exhaust target unit you control, and if you do, deal damage equal to its power to target face-up tower.

spells.name: Cosmic Water Magic
spells.effect:
Instacast
This card costs (1) less to play for each face-up Water tower.
Target unit you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells this turn.

spells.name: Dragonic Eruption
spells.effect: Deal 1500 to all units your opponent controls, and if you control four or more Dragon units, you may deal 1500 to target face-up tower.

spells.name: Endowment of the Dragon God
spells.effect:
You can only play one "Endowment of the Dragon God" each turn.
As an additional cost to play this card reveal any number of different Dragon units from your hand.
The next Dragon unit you play this turn costs (X) less to play. (X equals the number of Dragon units you revealed.)

spells.name: Endowment of the Sea God
spells.effect:
You can only play one "Endowment of the Sea God" each turn.
Flip any number of your face-up towers face-down. If you do, the next card you play this turn costs (X) less to play. (X equals the number of towers you flipped face-down.)

spells.name: Enemy of my Enemy
spells.effect:
Play only if your champion and spirit are different elements.
As an additional cost to play this card, discard a unit whose element is the same as your champion.
Search your deck for a unit with the same element as your spirit and add it to your hand.

spells.name: Father's Betrayal
spells.effect:
Instacast
Return target Exhausted unit you control to its owner's hand.

spells.name: Final Battle at the Argent Tower
spells.effect: For each of your destroyed towers, you may recover target unit, and for each of your opponent's destroyed towers, you may Exhaust target unit. Recovered units this way get +1000 this turn and Exhausted units this way get -1000 this turn.

spells.name: Gillian's Gambit
spells.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card flip your champion face-down.
If your Champion is "Gillian, the Witch Queen" look at the top five cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Water unit, put it into play. Otherwise, send it to the discard zone, and your opponent may destroy one of your towers.

spells.name: Hoenna's Inquest
spells.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card expel a Dark card from your hand.
Look at your opponent's hand. You may select and discard a card from their hand with cost (X) or less. (X equals the cost of the card you expelled.)

spells.name: Hoenna's Wrath
spells.effect:
This card costs (2) less to play if your champion is "Hoenna, Immoral Conjurer".
Put into play two Berserker Golem tokens (Unit/Golem/Dark/2000), then each non-Golem unit gets -X000 this turn. (X equals the number of Golem units you control.)

spells.name: Imbued by Ashes
spells.effect:
Instacast
Fire units you control get +500 this turn. If you control three or more Fire units, draw a card.

spells.name: Leviathan's Fury
spells.effect:
Instacast
This card costs (1) less to play for each of your face-up towers.
Return all units your opponent controls to their owner's hand.

spells.name: Mei-Yu's Mirror Magic
spells.effect: Exhaust target unit you control, and if you do, search your deck for a unit with the same name and put it into play.

spells.name: Return from Ashes
spells.effect: Destroy target Fire unit you control, and if you do, put into play a Fire unit from your discard zone with cost less than the destroyed unit.

spells.name: Revival of the Son
spells.effect: Put into play target unit with cost (X-1) from your discard zone.

spells.name: Ritual of Ashes
spells.effect:
Choose one.
* Your Fire spells cost (1) less to play this turn.
* Each time you play a Fire spell this turn, draw a card.

spells.name: Scales of Darkness
spells.effect: Each player sacrifices a unit and discards a card.

spells.name: Through Dangers Untold
spells.effect:
Play only while you control "The Great Magimaze".
Choose one. If you control "Maiden of the Maze, Seriah" you may choose both instead.
* Units and towers you control take no damage until your next turn.
* Remove two Maze counters from target "The Great Magimaze".

spells.name: United Empowerment
spells.effect:
Play only if you've destroyed an opponent's tower this turn.
Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Equip as many revealed Gear as possible to units you control. Send the rest to the discard zone.

spells.name: Wicked Pact
spells.effect: Destroy one of your towers ignoring its effects, and if you do, reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may add a card among them to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

spells.name: Astralic Invocation
spells.effect: Add up to two target basic units from your discard zone to your hand.

spells.name: Astralic Judgment

As an additional cost to play this card expel any number of basic units from your hand or from the field that you control.
Destroy a number of units and/or augments your opponent controls equal to or less than the number of cards expelled this way, then draw a card for each card destroyed this way.

spells.name: Astralic Law
spells.effect:
Choose one. If your opponent controls three or more units you may choose both.
* Put a Hyldian token (Unit/Warrior/Light/1000) into play.
* Draw a card for each basic unit you control.

spells.name: Beastking's Awakening
spells.effect: Put a Beast unit from your hand into play. Then if you control a Beast unit and an Elemental unit, draw a card.

spells.name: Evaerie Burial
spells.effect: Search your deck for up to two units with Ruined and put them into the discard zone.

spells.name: Evaerie Glamour
spells.effect:
Instacast
This turn target unit loses all abilities and becomes a (Unit/Evaerie/Dark/1000).

spells.name: Glacial Shuriken
spells.effect:
Instacast
Stun target unit. (A Stunned card cannot attack, block, or use activated abilities, until the end of the next turn.)

spells.name: Harmonization of Hope

Instacast
Target Light unit you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells this turn. If it is a basic unit, draw a card.

spells.name: Herdmother's Formation

spells.name: Hunt of the Nightriders
spells.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card you may sacrifice a unit.
Search your deck for a "Nightrider" unit and add it to your hand. If you paid the additional cost, your opponent sacrifices a unit.

spells.name: Ice Breath First Form: Cryostrike
spells.effect: Stun target unit with cost (2) or less. If that unit was already Stunned, destroy it instead. (A Stunned card cannot attack, block, or use activated abilities, until the end of the next turn.)

spells.name: Ice Breath Second Form: Cryostorm
spells.effect:
While your opponent controls a Stunned unit, neither player can add to the queue in response to this card.
Water units you control get +1000 and cannot be targeted by spells or abilities this turn.

spells.name: Jurasstic Strength
spells.effect:
Neither player can add to the queue in response to this card.
Target unit gets +1000 this turn.
Whenever a Dinosaur unit you control destroys an opponent's tower while you control three or more shards - You may add this card from your discard zone to your hand.

spells.name: Jurasstic Swipe
spells.effect:
Instacast
As an additional cost to play this card exhaust target Fire unit you control.
It deals damage equal to its power to another target unit. If you exhausted a Dinosaur unit and control four or more shards, return this card to your hand.

spells.name: Melantie's Gaze
spells.effect: Look at your opponent's hand. You may choose a non-unit card among them with cost (2) or less. Your opponent discards that card.

spells.name: Melanite's Manipulation
spells.effect: Put target unit from your opponent's discard zone into play under your control.

spells.name: Narrow Escape
spells.effect:
Instacast
Return target attacking or blocking unit you control to its owner's hand.

spells.name: Pengiro's Decree
spells.effect:
This card costs (1) less to play for each Stunned unit your opponent controls.
Draw two cards.
Whenever a Stunned unit your opponent controls is put into the discard zone - You may add this card from your discard zone to your hand.

spells.name: Primeval Roar
spells.effect:
Instacast
Deal 1500 to target unit. Then if you control four or more shards you may exhaust target shard an opponent controls.

spells.name: Primeval Shockwave

Instacast
Deal 2000 to all units. Then if you control seven or more shards, exhaust any number of target shards your opponent controls up to the number of units dealt damage this way.

spells.name: Ruined Reclamation
spells.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card you may sacrifice a unit.
Choose one. If you paid the additional cost, you may choose both.
* Trigger the Ruined ability of target unit you control.
* Add target unit with Ruined from your discard zone to your hand.

spells.name: Secret Pengutsu: Glacial Clones
spells.effect:
Instacast
Return target attacking or blocking unit you control to its owner's hand, and if you do, put two Clone tokens (Unit/Clone/Water/1000) into play.

spells.name: Soul Severing
spells.effect:
Instacast
Expel target unit from your opponent's discard zone, and if you do, put the top card of your opponent's deck into the dicard zone.

spells.name: Vindication of Valor

As an additional cost to play this card, sacrifice a unit.
Destroy target unit or augment. If you sacrificed a non-token basic unit, draw a card.

spells.name: Zonamian Barrier
spells.effect:
Instacast
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by your opponent's spells this turn.

spells.name: Zonamian Mending
spells.effect:
Instacast
Remove all damage from units you control. For each unit that had damage removed this way, recover a shard.

spells.name: Zonamian Rage
spells.effect:
Instacast
Place a +500 counter on target attacking unit, and if you do, it gains Overrun this turn. (Whenever this attacking card deals damage to a unit, you may deal any excess damage to an opponent's tower.)

spells.name: Zonamian Stampede
spells.effect: Deal 2000 to target active unit. If you control a Beast unit, deal 3000 instead.

spells.name: Abyssal Maw
spells.effect: Target unit gets -X000 this turn. (X equals the number of Dark units in your discard zone.)

spells.name: Brilliant Verdure
spells.effect:
If this is the second card you've played this turn, this card costs (1) less to play.
Look at the top four cards of your deck. You may add a unit and/or augment among them to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

spells.name: Curse of the Witch Queen
spells.effect: Take control of up to two target exhausted units.

spells.name: Twisting Premonition
spells.effect:
Instacast
Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into the discard zone. Draw a card.

spells.name: Void Flame Expulsion
spells.effect:
Instacast
Play only while you control a Fire unit. Neither player can add to the queue in response to this card. Expel target unit or augment, and if you do, it's owner draws a card.
